node.title: Accused Cleo kidnapper had fake family on social media
node.description: The man charged with abducting four-year-old Cleo Smith is linked to a social media account that posts about loving children’s dolls and claims to have a partner and five children, despite living alone.
node.content:
["Family and neighbours of the man charged with abducting four-year-old Cleo Smith say his image appears on a social media account that posts about loving children's dolls and claiming to have a partner and children, despite living alone.", "Terrence Darrell Kelly yesterday faced Carnarvon Magistrate\u2019s Court charged with one count of forcibly taking a child under 16.", "The ABC has spoken to family members and neighbours of Mr Kelly. They described him as reclusive but said in recent weeks he had started behaving more socially.", "They said he had gone to visit family at their home.", "The profile, which features photos of him, also posts about loving Bratz\u00a0dolls.", "", "
The social media profile features images of Bratz dolls.\u00a0(Facebook)
", "The profile included a video of the man in a room with shelves filled with dolls with a filter giving him larger eyes and heart emojis.", "Police have revealed Cleo was found at the home just before 1:00am on Wednesday playing with toys, but would not be drawn on what was in the room where she was found.", "They have released audio of the moment officers found her but not the video, from a police body-worn camera.", "", "
Cleo was reported missing from the Blowholes campsite on\u00a0October 16.(ABC News: James Carmody)
", "The social media profile says \"Alpha male and dad,\" and then in Italian it states \"Australian-born of an Italian mother\".", "On January 27, a post said he had warned his children, of which he claimed to have five, about online safety.", "The profile also shares videos of a child in a bathing suit, captioned \"my princess\", and another of a boy sitting on a couch, captioned \"my son in Western Australia, miss you big boy\".", "", "
Forensics officers at the house where Cleo Smith was rescued, and where Mr Kelly allegedly lived alone.\u00a0(AAP Image: Richard Wainwright)
", "A third video shows a heavily pregnant woman, and is titled \"not long now\".", "Residents and family members told the ABC the man lived alone.", "Comments on the profile's posts included those from other doll enthusiasts.", "The community has\u00a0been targeting the posts, and people linked to them.", "One man changed his profile picture to say he did not know Mr Kelly, and asked people to leave him alone.", "
Family describe isolated man raised by his grandmother
", "The ABC understands the man comes from a large family with links up and down the Mid West.\u00a0", "", "
Police raided the house where Mr Kelly was living and found Cleo on Tuesday night.(ABC News)
", "The man's father is in Karratha, and had not had much contact with him but was said to be shocked when he heard the news.", "According to his first cousin, who the ABC has chosen not to name, Mr Kelly and his older brother were raised in\u00a0Carnarvon by their grandmother, who died around three years ago.\u00a0", "The cousin said he saw\u00a0Mr Kelly\u00a0at the shops on October 19, and was surprised at how friendly he was.", "\"He was a very quiet person,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"He would usually stick to himself.\"", "", "
A police officer stands guard at the house where Cleo was found alone in a bedroom.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "But he said his cousin greeted him at the shops and told him they \"have to stick together now\", which he thought was strange.", "He said a number of people in the community say they saw the man buying diapers at the store, but may have assumed he was running errands for friends or family members with children.", "He\u00a0said the situation had affected many of his family members, who may not have had anything to do with the man for many years.", "", "
Cameron Blaine describes the moment he found Cleo Smith.
", "In a town of just 5,000 people, community speculation around the identity of the man living at the home where Cleo was found has reached fever pitch, with many sharing details of the profiles online.", "Another community member, who did not wish to be named, told the ABC she had seen some backlash\u00a0online against certain groups and was concerned it could worsen.", "\"It's like the Police Commissioner said, we have to come together,\" she said.", "Police Commissioner Chris Dawson has warned people against making comments online, in the wake of Mr Kelly's arrest."]
